articles.content:

articles.title: Susanna Reid: GMB host 'confronts two men' in supermarket car park 'Heart was pounding' - Express
articles.description: SUSANNA REID - who hosts Good Morning Britain alongside Piers Morgan - has opened up about how she recently confronted two men in a supermarket car park and admitted her 'heart was pounding' when she walked away from the situation.
